question: Comet Hyakutake orbits the sun every 55 years. Jason's dad saw the Comet when he was 23 years old. Jason saw the comet a second time when he was four times the age his dad was when he saw the Comet. How old was Jason when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Jason saw the Comet for the second time when he was 23 years * 4= <<23*4=92>>92 years old.
Comet Hyakutake can be seen every 55 years, so Jason saw the comet for the first time when he was 92 years - 55 years = <<92-55=37>>37 years old.
#### 37
